## BaseError class

Blueprint for the BaseError which will be extended by other specific errors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BaseError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Example


```ts
const error = new BaseError({ message: 'There is a base error!', statusCode: 400 })
error.get()

```
